alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Maverick; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 12:52AM CDT until June 08 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maverick County in south central Texas... Western Dimmit County in south central Texas... Western Zavala County in south central Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1252 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Quemado to 9 miles southwest of Normandy to 29 miles southwest of Rosita, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eagle Pass, La Pryor, Quemado, El Indio, Chula Vista, Paloma, Darling, Washer, Cometa, Radar Base, Normandy, Rosita, Las Colonias, Fabrica, Las Quintas Fronterizas, Siesta Acres, Eidson Road, Farias Lake, Elm Creek and Seco Mines. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
